If anyone has any feature requests, please post them here.

I am going to keep a running list of things that I plan to add to the next version:
  • Assertions for IEnumerable
  • Assertions for DateTime

Hi --

I would love to have the ability to run tests and ignore exceptions.  So, for example, I am testing some functionality in the production code and it encounters an exception that my application knows about and eats, at the moment, as I currently understand the testing framework, the test will stop and fail nonetheless.  I would like an easy way to specify that I want the test to ignore that exception and continue executing.

Don't know if this is possible, but it's worth a thought.

Regards,

Mike

+1 for IEnumerable.

And its not that hard, just change ICollection to IEnumerable, and use Count(). It worked for me :o)
